name: Help Jack finally fulfill his Role as Caretaker
name_original: Help Jack finally fulfill his Role as Caretaker
description:
Play this cool game where you get to kill a boy with an axe. Find your way through a mythological maze and stand the freezing cold of the Colorado winter. Shine in the role as Jack and help him finally carry out his duty as a good Caretaker.

The playtime ranges from 5 to 30 minutes. – Depending on your puzzle solving skills.

Be one of the first beta-testers. We are happy about any criticism and praise.
